airflow.models.taskreschedule¶

Module Contents¶

class airflow.models.taskreschedule.TaskReschedule(task, execution_date, try_number, start_date, end_date, reschedule_date)[소스]¶

Bases:airflow.models.base.Base

TaskReschedule tracks rescheduled task instances.

__table_args__[소스]¶
static find_for_task_instance(task_instance, session)[소스]¶

Returns all task reschedules for the task instance and try number, in ascending order.

매개 변수:task_instance (airflow.models.TaskInstance) -- the task instance to find task reschedules for
